items.name: BeSLab
items.description: For seeding a BeSLab instance to perform safety and security assessment on POI, MOI, VOI etc.

items.name: BLIman
items.description: BLIman is a command line interface for managing BeSLab deployments. It can be used to bring up the lab in 3 different modes.

items.name: BeSLighthouse
items.description: Community dashboard for security assessment of open source projects of interest for BeSecure community. Various visualizations on Projects of Interest and Vulnerabilities of interest are available in the dashboard

items.name: ollama
items.description: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, DeepSeek-R1, Phi-4, Gemma 3, Mistral Small 3.1 and other large language models.

items.name: langchain
items.description: Framework to develop application based on LLM and AI

items.name: counterfit
items.description: a CLI that provides a generic automation layer for assessing the security of ML models

items.name: adversarial-robustness-toolbox
items.description: Adversarial Robustness Toolbox (ART) - Python Library for Machine Learning Security - Evasion, Poisoning, Extraction, Inference - Red and Blue Teams

items.name: scorecard
items.description: OpenSSF Scorecard - Security health metrics for Open Source

items.name: criticality_score
items.description: Gives criticality score for an open source project

items.name: DependencyCheck
items.description: OWASP dependency-check is a software composition analysis utility that detects publicly disclosed vulnerabilities in application dependencies.

items.name: trivy
items.description: Find vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, secrets, SBOM in containers, Kubernetes, code repositories, clouds and more

items.name: bandit
items.description: Bandit is a tool designed to find common security issues in Python code.

items.name: zaproxy
items.description: zaproxy is an open source tool that improves identification of vulnerabilities in your project with just one command.

items.name: fossology
items.description: FOSSology is an open source license compliance software system and toolkit.  As a toolkit you can run license, copyright and export control scans from the command line.  As a system, a database and web ui are provided to give you a compliance workflow. License, copyright and export scanners are tools used in the workflow.

items.name: prometheus
items.description: The Prometheus monitoring system and time series database.

items.name: grafana
items.description: The open and composable observability and data visualization platform. Visualize metrics, logs, and traces from multiple sources like Prometheus, Loki, Elasticsearch, InfluxDB, Postgres and many more.

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

items.name: keycloak
items.description: Open Source Identity and Access Management For Modern Applications and Services

license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0

items.name: BeSman
items.description: Command line utility for provisioning customized security environments. This utility comes under the Be-Secure project which is an umbrella of open source security projects, tools, sandbox environments to perform security assessments and secure open source technology stacks
